column2: The identification code for the participant. Where the participant comes from Prolific this is the sha1 hash of their Prolific ID. Where they do not, this is the sha1 hash of their starting timestamp plus a random decimal portion
Trial number (sequential)
Block number (includes sub-blocks and practice blocks, so 2nd block 1st sub-block is block number 4 if there is one practice block and two sub-blocks per block)
Whether the trial is a practice trial
Whether the trial offers a choice of advisor (choice) or not (force), or no advisor (catch)
Name of the trial type
The number of dots added to the more populated box and subtracted from the less populated box. The objective task difficulty

The box containing the most dots
0.	left
1.	right

The participant’s initial answer to which box contains the most dots
0.	left
1.	right

The participant’s final answer to which box contains the most dots
0.	left
1.	right
The participant’s rating of their confidence in their first response [0-50]
The participant’s rating of their confidence in their final response [0-50]

The category into which the participant’s confidence falls. This is calculated each trial by taking the participant’s confidence ratings so far and determining whether the current value falls into the
0.	bottom 30%
1.	middle 40%
2.	top 30%
Whether the trial offers a choice of advisor
The advisorId of the advisor in the choice slot at the top of the screen
The advisorId of the advisor in the choice slot at the bottom of the screen
The advisorId of the advisor giving advice on the trial

Whether the advisor agrees with the participant. Basic value is overwritten by the R script and the raw value is stored as advisorAgreesOld because early versions of the JavaScript code reported this incorrectly

Whether the advisor endorsed the left (0) or right (1) side. Basic value is overwritten by the R script and the raw value is stored as adviceSideOld because early version of the JavaScript code reported this incorrectly
Whether the participant received feedback on their response
Newline-separated strings of any warnings about the trial reported by JavaScript (e.g. that the difficulty has reached its maximum level)
Timestamp of the beginning of the initial response phase
Timestamp of the fixation cross appearance for the initial response phase
Timestamp of the stimulus onset for the initial response phase
Timestamp of the stimulus offset for the initial response phase
Timestamp of the initial response
Text displayed to the participant indicating the side which was endorsed by the advisor
Duration of the advisor choice phase (ms)
Duration of the advice phase (ms)
Timestamp of the beginning of the final response phase
Timestamp of the fixation cross appearance for the final response phase
Timestamp of the stimulus onset for the final response phase
Timestamp of the stimulus offset for the final response phase
Timestamp of the final response
Whether the advisor endorsed the right side
Archive of raw advisor endorsed-side variable from JavaScript
Archive of raw advisor agreement variable from JavaScript
The advisor’s agreement profile
The amount the participant’s confidence increased in their final response
The amount the participant’s confidence increased in their final response, capped by the magnitude of the largest possible positive increase
The amount the participant’s confidence changed towards the direction endorsed by the advisor
The amount the participant’s confidence changed towards the direction endorsed by the advisor using confidenceShiftRaw
Whether the participant changed their response side in their final answer
Whether the participant’s initial response was correct
Whether the participant’s final response was correct
The participant’s initial confidence coded on a [-50,50] scale where leftwards answers are [-50,-1] and rightward answers are [1,50]
The participant’s final confidence coded on a [-50,50] scale where leftwards answers are [-50,-1] and rightward answers are [1,50]
Whether the influence on a trial is negative
A shorthand integer used for identifying a particular participant
